metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0670 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in Openstack manilla owning a Ceph File system "share", which enables the owner to read/write any manilla share or entire file system. The vulnerability is due to a bug in the "volumes" plugin in Ceph Manager. This allows an attacker to compromise Confidentiality and Integrity of a file system. Fixed in RHCS 5.2 and Ceph 17.2.2.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This is fixed in focal-updates, jammy-updates, and kinetic-updates, but is not yet in the -security pocket. volumes manager module was introduced in ceph v14

criterions.comment: ceph: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
